participant_1.background:
I binged on Ender's Game the whole day and then went online shopping.
In my spare time, I like to make people laugh.
I'm originally from the Midwest.
I am proud of my brother for achieving his dream of playing football in the NFL.
i like spending time with my friends and family.

participant_2.background:
After I quit my job, I used my free time to start rock collecting and making macaroni art.
i want to go back to school.
I spend time with my mom and my dog and enjoy a little gossip.
i love kids.
i live on an island.

content.text: Not much! Just enjoying my day off.
Me too! I just finished reading Ender's Game. It was really good!
I've heard good things about it! What's it about?
It's about a young boy who's recruited to be a child soldier in a war against aliens. It's really exciting and suspenseful!
That sounds really interesting! I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good book.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, go online shopping, and make people laugh.
I like doing those things too! I also like to rock collect and make macaroni art.
That's cool! I've never tried rock collecting, but it sounds interesting.
It's really fun! I love finding different types of rocks and learning about them.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have fun with it.
Thanks! What do you like most about your job?
I like the people I work with and the fact that I get to make people laugh.
That's great! I'm glad you like your job
